snippet.title: Josh Hamilton uses spray glue to combat bat tossing
snippet.description:
Friday July 6, 2012 11:25 pm
... spray glue. The Texas Rangers slugger was growing increasingly concerned over his tendency to send bats... can of glue often used for upholstery and fabric inside cars. He hasn't thrown a bat since the discovery... of the glue that he sprays on the bat handle. Hamilton's bat-tossing became something of a sideshow earlier
